name: details
description: Click the disclosure triangle to show all hidden fields

name: Antibody
title: Antibody
description: Antibody with best UKB association result

name: Pair_is_Associated
title: Pair is assoc?
description: Boolean indicating whether this pair is considered replicated

name: Standard_Level
title: Std. lev.
description: Standard group this pair is part of [Unknown (unk), Tier 1, Tier 2, Expected Negative (exp_neg)]

name: UKB_adj_p
title: UKB adj. p
description: Per-disease BH FDR adjusted UKB nominal p-value

name: TNX_adj_p
title: TNX adj. p
description: Per-disease BH FDR adjusted TNX nominal p-value

name: TNX_OR
title: TNX OR
description: Odds ratio for TNX association test [categorical]

name: Replication_Status
title: Replication status
description: The UKB-TNX replication status for this dis-org pair [could_not: UKB sig, not enough TNX data to try replication; did_not_attempt: UKB not sig, so no replication attempted; did_not: UKB sig, TNX not sig; rep: UKB sig, TNX sig]

name: UKB_nCase
title: UKB number of cases
description: Number of cases in UKB analysis

name: UKB_nControl
title: UKB number of controls
description: Number of controls in UKB analysis

name: TNX_nCase
title: TNX number of cases
description: Number of cases in TNX analysis

name: TNX_nControl
title: TNX number of controls
description: Number of controls in TNX analysis
